hours: Open For Indoor Dining, Outdoor Dining, and Curbside Takeout Only
tagLine: Old-fashioned, family-run institution specializing in homestyle breakfast & lunch diner classics.
notes: Small place, good food, very friendly fast service, parking in rear
Fantastic diner food at a fun location, served by wonderful folks.
Good home cooking in a relaxed setting. So friendly! Would highly recommend the Montreal smoked meat special - they were cooking it up in the smoker outside when we arrived!
